about_the_game:
◆ Story

In order to prevent the organisation from suffering huge losses and being liquidated by the upper echelons, the Canglong Society decides to kidnap Wu Zixuan in order to find out the true whereabouts of the goods and quickly retrieve the key supplies to turn the situation around.

◆Characters & Power

Wu Zixuan: A golden flower of the police force, the core character involved in the investigation and seizure of the operation, decisive and strong style.

Canglong Society: The player belongs to the illegal organisation, an underground force focused on the illegal drug trade. Faced with external oppression and internal pressure, they must quickly find the missing goods to quell the crisis.

◆ Gameplay

Story line: Players must investigate and interrogate the policewoman step by step to find out the real information about the "goods".

◇Interrogation and Conditioning: Players can use various methods (such as threats, deception, teasing, etc.) to break down the policewoman's psychological defences, accumulating Conditioning Levels in the process.After the conditioning level is reached, key information is identified through interrogation.

◇Conversation Choice: Players must choose the appropriate conversation based on the policewoman's reaction to find the key clues.

◆Game Features

◇ Drama Crime Game
◇ Exquisite 3D animation and multiple action options

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, Extreme Violence, sexual assault, non-consensual sex, BDSM ,drug abuse. General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.

name: The Endless Abyss: A Busty Cop’s Corrupted Soul

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A young policewoman, Wu Zixuan, is kidnapped to track down a criminal organisation. The player interrogates her by threatening her with sexual violence, only to find out confidential police information.
